title.value: Investigation of dosimetric characteristics of radiochromic film in response to alpha particles emitted from Americium-241
title.justification: The title clearly captures the central theme of the paper, which is the investigation into the dosimetric characteristics of radiochromic film when exposed to alpha particles from Americium-241.
title.quote: Investigation of dosimetric characteristics of radiochromic film in response to alpha particles emitted from Americium-241

extractions.description: This paper focuses on developing and validating a dosimetry protocol for alpha-particles using radiochromic film, specifically the EBT3 model, through Monte Carlo simulations and experiments with Americium-241. It aims to enhance alpha-particle dosimetry in radiotherapy.

type.justification: The study involves practical measurement and simulation using Monte Carlo methods to validate dosimetry protocols.
type.quote: Purpose: This study aimed to develop a dose-calibration protocol...using Monte Carlo (MC) simulations and measurements with unlaminated EBT3 films.

name.justification: The study is directly related to dosimetry, which is a key aspect of medical physics, particularly in the context of radiotherapy.
name.quote: Accurate measurements of absorbed dose are required for this purpose. Gafchromic external beam therapy (EBT) radiochromic films have been widely used in radiotherapy.

name.justification: The research is focused on improving radiation treatments through better dosimetry for alpha particles in oncology.
name.quote: α-emitting radionuclides have gained popularity in cancer treatment due to their high linear energy transfer...therefore, a dose-calibration film protocol for α-particles is required.

name.value: Monte Carlo Simulations in Medical Physics
name.justification: The paper develops a Monte Carlo simulation to model the dosimetry of alpha particles, which is crucial for accurate dose measurements in medical physics.
name.quote: Methods: In this study, a MC-based user code was developed using the Geant4 simulation toolkit to model and simulate an Am-241 source and an unlaminated EBT3 film.

name.justification: Geant4 is explicitly mentioned as the simulation toolkit used for Monte Carlo simulations in the study.
name.quote: Methods: In this study, a MC-based user code was developed using the Geant4 simulation toolkit to model and simulate an Am-241 source and an unlaminated EBT3 film.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Geant4 is cited as the toolkit used for the simulations in the study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Agostinelli S, Allison J, Amako K, et al. GEANT4—a simulation toolkit. Nuclear Instruments Methods Phys Res Section A: Accel, Spectrom, Detectors and Assoc Equip. 2003;506:250-303.
